OK. I'm sunburned, tired and ready to snap...but if I missed anyone's post, 
tell me and send it to me again.

*Growling, IR recieves HotRod's transmission...but with the armor playing on 
the holo-ship it was garbled and she had a hard time telling what it was he 
had said. So, with a heave she ripped away a fair section of roof and 
dropped to the floor.
Then converting back to robot mode, clad from neck to tow in the same black 
battle armor, a leadway was opened to ALL Maximals which were positioned in 
the holo-deck.*

" Playtime's over, kiddies. But Congrads to the survivors. We'll have to 
play this again sometimes. Until then, go have fun until further notice."

* From there the surrounding ship vanished, leaving a grid lined room where 
all could see eachother.
Iron looked all of them over...holding their weapons...before quickly 
turning to the side and exiting the room, blake cape billowing out behind.*

COMM: " Your last message was garbled, HotRod. Could you repeat, please?

* Leaving her commm open for reply, Her eyes turned to the walls of the 
Maximal City.
Iron Raptor had remembered Prowl telling her about the ship's mind. 
Cyndro...he called it.  Probably just another Iris.
But...just in case:*

" Cyndro, report."
